DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study find patient willing self-report symptom first 5 day follow discharge , leave hospital `` ambulatory surgery '' ( `` ambulatory surgery '' patient surgery go home within 24 hour ) .
DOC.criteria: The patient must undergo surgery indication track within Gynecologic AXR program expect postoperative discharge within 24 hour surgery . These surgical procedure typically include : minimally invasive hysterectomy radical hysterectomy , salpingooophorectomies [ mention ] , minimally invasive staging procedure . The patient must phone number email address . The patient must willing selfreport postoperative symptom automate phone system via online platform . The patient must speak read fluent English . NonEnglish speaking patient Patients unwilling provide contact information ( email phone number )
